title: How to Make Peeps Popcorn

steps.headline: Microwave the popcorn.
steps.description: Follow the directions listed on your microwaveable popcorn bag. Be sure to listen to the crackles. Continuing to heat the bag when there is no noise, will result in burnt popcorn.

steps.headline: Pour the bag in a large bowl.
steps.description: Pick out and discard any unpopped kernels.

steps.headline: Melt the peeps.
steps.description: Add the butter to a small saucepan and place it over low heat. Slowly melt the Peeps in the melted butter. Stir continuously to avoid the mixture becoming burnt.

steps.headline: Pour the Peeps mixture over the popcorn.
Transfer the popcorn mixture to a lined baking sheet.
Allow the mixture to harden.
steps.description: Set the sheet aside until the popcorn is cooled.

text: Preparing the Popcorn Microwave the popcorn. Follow the directions listed on your microwaveable popcorn bag. Be sure to listen to the crackles. Continuing to heat the bag when there is no noise, will result in burnt popcorn. Pour the bag in a large bowl. Pick out and discard any unpopped kernels. Set the bowl aside.  Finishing the Popcorn Melt the peeps. Add the butter to a small saucepan and place it over low heat. Slowly melt the Peeps in the melted butter. Stir continuously to avoid the mixture becoming burnt. Pour the Peeps mixture over the popcorn. Ensure everything is coated evenly. Transfer the popcorn mixture to a lined baking sheet. Spread the mixture out evenly. Allow the mixture to harden. Set the sheet aside until the popcorn is cooled. Finished.
